author: Por Europa Press
title: El Papa denuncia las «matanzas de inocentes en el mundo» y critica las «masacres debidas a las armas» | Diario Digital Nuestro País
text: Roma, 28 Dic. (EUROPA PRESS) – El Papa ha denunciado este jueves las «matanzas de inocentes en el mundo», en un mensaje en la red social X (antes Twitter), donde también ha criticado las «masacres debidas a las armas». «Cuántas matanzas de inocentes en el mundo: en el vientre materno, en las rutas de los desesperados que buscan esperanza, en las vidas de tantos niños cuya infancia está devastada por la guerra. Estos niños son los pequeños Jesús de hoy», ha expresado. Asimismo, ha recalcado que, actualmente, «como en el tiempo de Herodes, las intrigas del mal, que se oponen a la luz divina, se mueven a la sombra de la hipocresía y del ocultamiento». «¡Cuántas masacres debidas a las armas ocurren en un silencio ensordecedor, a escondidas de todos!», ha lamentado. Según señala ‘Vatican News’, el Papa ha pronunciado en varias ocasiones las palabras «masacre de los inocentes», en recuerdo a las víctimas de los conflictos en curso, en Ucrania, Siria, Yemen, Armenia, Azerbaiyán, Sudán, Congo y, en particular, de la guerra que tiene lugar en Gaza. Así, en su mensaje Urbi et Orbi, hizo un llamamiento para poner fin a la actual carrera armamentística. «La gente, que no quiere armas sino pan, que lucha por salir adelante y pide la paz -dijo-, ignora cuánto dinero público se gasta en armamento. Sin embargo, ¡deberían saberlo! Que se hable de ello, que se escriba, para que se conozcan los intereses y las ganancias que mueven los hilos de las guerras», señaló.

author: @Vijestime
title: What is a man without shame?
text: What is a man without shame? This is a man without morals and honor. And what is a man without morals and honor? Nothing. At first glance, it has a human form, but it is not a civilized human being, since the feeling of shame is the basic characteristic of a normal and healthy person. What is the opposite of shame, as its negation? First of all, the lack of brakes. Since you are not ashamed of anything, you are not alien to any deviant behavior according to the accepted norms of civilized society. You can lie, steal, cheat, manipulate, insult, kidnap, be violent and unscrupulous. You can do whatever comes to your mind and whatever you think is useful for you. There are such people in every society. But in organized communities, such people are on the margins. They are not held back by shame, they are not held back by morals, possibly only by the fear of punishment. In civilized societies, what jumps out of the legal framework is sanctioned by regulations. What is not illegal, but not moral either, is subject to social sanction. In order for this social sanction to work, it is necessary that the "punished" person has a sense of shame. If it is not there, the social sanction does not work. The problem is when a society loses the basic characteristics of a civilized community, when those from the margins shamelessly and morally group together, unite and declare themselves the majority, and since they have no brakes, they trample on law, justice, laws, ethics, and even the Constitution itself without any consideration. , and impose their own rules and anti-values. Those who believe in ethics, morality, honesty, first do not fully understand what is happening to them. They are amazed, they retreat, they don't believe that this is possible. Then when they understand, they start to rebel, protest, see what happened to them. If such a condition lasts too long and continues to worsen, they fall into despair and retreat again. Especially when they see how many around them, whom until yesterday they believed were also ethical people with a moral compass, begin to "fall" one after the other under the burden of offers that cannot be refused. That is, they can, but it's not worth it. And in the end they realize, to their horror, that society has failed in every possible aspect and that entropy has already engulfed it. Theft and open robbery become a principle, there is no one to oppose the violence, fear has shackled many, laws apply selectively and only to protect the new class. The rule of law experiences its own negation every day, and immorality becomes a principle. Talking about shame becomes out of place, even stupid. If someone rebels against this order, raises his voice, the whole machinery descends on him to cut him down and embarrass him at all costs, because that is precisely the worst punishment for him. It is a demonstrative exercise for others too, to see what awaits them if they too think of some kind of rebellion. The machinery of lies buzzes over everyone's heads. Without the media, which when establishing this anti-system must first be captured, stop being media and turn into propaganda services and well-paid factories of lies, this new anti-system cannot be established. And that with a kind of paradox: now that there is an Internet and its "eternal memory", when every lie can be discovered in two clicks, it is not an obstacle at all. What does this show us - that a lie is no longer considered an unacceptable deviation that can embarrass and disqualify the person who utters it from further public speaking. No. He continues on and on and on, not caring at all about himself from yesterday, nor about those who listen to him, nor about those who are supposed to believe him. How that? Well, since those who listen to them have already accepted the lie as a standard, they do not expect the one who utters it to be ashamed of it, they do not even condemn him. This is achieved by increased action - the factory of lies works tirelessly, in three shifts, it never shuts down. Yesterday's lies are buried by today's lies, and today's lies are buried by tomorrow's lies, and no one remembers that anymore. Thus, the difference between truth and lies, morality and immorality, good and evil is completely erased over time. They lie shamelessly, unscrupulously, as if there is no tomorrow. There is no fear of sanctions because there is no one left to enforce them, since the same ones are sitting there. They are also not uncomfortable that many people still understand and remember that they are lies. This is how this personal pathology spreads and turns into a social pathology. The country is collapsing materially, because it is looting without measure, scruples and brakes (robbers have never been scrupulous in history), but it is collapsing morally even more. The whole society is turning into reality. A gallery of the most outrageous characters without occupation and life compass occupying television with a national frequency and showing deviant behavior of all kinds without any leeway. The worse, the more you pay. That "program" is then grabbed by the tabloids and continues to spread the mission of collapsing the value system. This is ideally followed by political reality, which, in terms of the behavior of the actors and the "values" it promotes, is not far behind this "folk" one. And then one moment you realize that nothing beyond that exists anymore. There is nothing. No culture, no art, no music, no theater, no success of ordinary people, no beauty, no goodness. Nothing but lies and reality shows. If society finds the strength to pull itself out of this calamity, there is still hope to be saved. It won't be easy, it won't happen overnight, getting sober will be difficult and painful, but that catharsis must be passed. If shame returns to society as the supreme principle, then everything else returns with a domino effect. Bonus video:

author: Mike Medianoche
title: Naomi Asensi adelanta qué va a hacer con el premio de ganadora de ‘GH VIP 8’: “Os va a encantar”
text:
Naomi Asensi en el debate final de 'GH VIP'.
Bluper Naomi Asensi adelanta qué va a hacer con el premio de ganadora de ‘GH VIP 8’: “Os va a encantar” El reality vivió este jueves su debate final, donde Naomi entró estando “todavía en shock” por haber ganado. 28 diciembre, 2023 23:22 guardar GH VIP Televisión Mike Medianoche Aunque Gran Hermano se caracteriza por ser la vida en directo, los debates finales, como los de Supervivientes , suelen ser grabados . Y así, este 28 de diciembre, GH VIP ha ofrecido en el prime time de Telecinco una última gala grabada en la que todos sus concursantes han puesto sobre la mesa las cuentas que tenían pendientes. Ese debate tuvo lugar a la mañana siguiente de la final, algo que quedó claro en muchos comentarios, aunque se intentaba disimular.
“ Hemos vivido con ellos 99 días de emoción ”, aseguraba en su presentación Ion Aramendi, el encargado de este debate. Así, relataba cómo en la convivencia se ha disfrutado de risas de amor, se han visto cómo nacían parejas y otras se rompían, había bailes, “despelote” y “ una nueva ganadora, Naomi Asensi ”.
Tras saludar a todos los protagonistas, a los que chocó las manos, e incluso abrazó a alguno, Aramendi advertía cómo se han vivido “ historias trepidantes” en la que “ muchos habéis acabado fatal”. Y así, dio paso a Naomi, que emergía del suelo, en lo alto de la escalera.
[Marlène Mourreu, Belén Esteban o Adara Molinero: todos los ganadores de 'GH VIP' han sido mujeres]
“¿Cómo estás?”, preguntaba el presentador. “En shock aún, he dormido una hora”, relataba la que fuese participante de La isla de las Tentaciones, desvelando que el programa se grabó al día siguiente de la final. Pero justo después corregía: “Llevo días sin dormir. Estoy feliz, pero aún asimilando. Es muy fuerte”.
Fue entonces cuando Ion Aramendi le preguntó que va a hacer con el premio. “Tengo un proyectito, que lo voy a contar dentro de poco, y os va a encantar”, adelantaba la también colaboradora de Así es la vida, que alcanzó se pudo embolsar 70.600 euros, de los 150.000 que empezaron a jugarse.
“No he llorado en todo el concurso, lo estoy llorando estos días. E stoy superorgullosa, me siento que es una triple victoria, muy difícil ”, seguía diciendo Naomi, en referencia a cómo se enfrentó a Luitingo y Jéssica, “una trama que nos han metido con colador, y aun así, he ganado”. La mala relación con Bueno es evidente, y por eso, la sevillana le invitaba a que se centrase en sí misma, y no en los que han sido sus compañeros. Lutingo, por su parte, le dio la enhorabuena y le invitó a que disfrutrase. “La semifinal no la viví bien, estoy saturada”, admitía Naomi, que sabía que en el fondo, lo importante de todo lo que estaba pasando, es que “he ganado”.

author: Decatur Daily Democrat
title: Ready to Launch Cybria Mainnet: An Innovative Blend of Blockchain and Artificial Intelligence | News | decaturdailydemocrat.com
text: Transformative Launch Marks a New Era for Cybria Ecosystem Istanbul, Turkey--(Newsfile Corp. - December 28, 2023) - In August 2023, Cybria embarked on a groundbreaking journey with the ambitious mission of spearheading a blockchain revolution. The destination: Cybria Mainnet - an innovative platform seamlessly fusing blockchain technology and Artificial Intelligence (AI) is set to launch on December 30, 2023. This transformative venture is poised to elevate the Ethereum ecosystem by enhancing scalability, transaction speed, and security. Cybria Mainnet Ready to Launch on December 30, 2023 Cybria Layer 2 Cybria operates as a Layer 2 blockchain platform strategically positioned on the Ethereum network. Designed to augment scalability and bolster transaction efficiency, Cybria leverages the power of Cybersecurity and AI technologies to fortify network safety and optimize performance. The marriage of blockchain and AI opens doors to novel applications across diverse domains, underscoring the pivotal role AI plays in advancing various aspects of Cybria. The Evolution of AI Integration The journey commenced with the experimental Testnet v1, which evolved into the more robust v2. This evolution marked the advent of a new Layer 2 Blockchain solution, one supercharged by AI capabilities. The integration of AI into blockchain technology signifies a leap towards innovative and powerful applications, setting the stage for Cybria's imminent impact. Launching Cybria Mainnet: December 30, 2023 After four months of anticipation, the Cybria Mainnet launch is set to launch on December 30, 2023. This milestone event will not only unveil the Mainnet but also introduce the Cybria Bridge and Cybria Swap, key components that will animate the Cyba Ecosystem. The launch heralds a new era of possibilities, where the synergy of blockchain and AI is set to redefine the digital landscape. Cybria Bridge and Swap The Cybria Bridge stands as a gateway for the seamless transfer of digital assets and data between Ethereum and Cybria. At the Mainnet release, the Ethereum-Cyba Chain Bridge will be available, facilitating the fluid movement of assets. Simultaneously, the Cybria Swap empowers users to transact on the Cyba Chain while enhancing liquidity, providing a comprehensive solution for those entering the Cyba ecosystem. With the inauguration of Cybria Mainnet, enthusiasts and early adopters are invited to join the Cyba ecosystem and embark on a journey of innovation and growth. Cybria Mainnet represents not only a technical milestone but a pivotal moment in the evolution of blockchain and AI integration. In summary, the launch of Cybria Mainnet marks a turning point in the realm of blockchain technology, signaling a future where the fusion of AI and blockchain redefines the possibilities within the digital landscape.
